text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Now, today's training is about this much, oh?
What's wrong, McQueen?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: No, there are people who are staring at us.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ….Hah!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer, is that someone you know?
No, but…. I'm sure she is…….

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Well, I did my best for once today! After 
this, it's time for McQueen to roll!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
What is it?!? That's not even the name 
of the event? I won't do that!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ah!? Wait, McQueen!!

I don't know her, but I know how hard she works. The horse girl 
who is always working hard on self-training until the end.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heh… Heh….Heh….Heh….

After all, today she continues to run until 
she becomes the last person on track.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heh….Heh….Waah!?
(Thud!!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heh……Ouch….

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ….Even if I run so much, Rice is….

It was as if the figure was covered by Mejiro McQueen who 
continued to run towards the goal of the “TennouShou (Spring)”.
Are you okay?
Are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh …. ah …McQueen-sans trainer-san….

If you hurt your leg, you better not overdo it today. Even more 
so, if you want to win the race.

If you hurt your leg, you better not overdo it today. Even more 
so, if you want to win the race.

Even if you can't work hard now, if you 
have strong feelings, you can win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sobbing
Eh!? what, it hurts so much that it makes you cry!?
Eh!? what, it hurts so much that it makes you cry!?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry… it's different.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I like to run, but I can't win. And that's 
when I saw McQueen-san's race.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Even Rice wants to win!

It is actually difficult to keep thinking “I want to win”. But 
Rice Shower had such strength.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Rice is in the Derby…
It is enough to pass, I've seen you run so hard over and over.
It is enough to pass, I've seen you run so hard over and over.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: No, no , Rice is not such a great horse girl.

I know that Rice Shower can do it. Speaking of the Derby, it is a 
race where people who have worked hard gather for their 
prosperity (Success).

However, Rice Shower has the ability to get to Mejiro McQueen and 
run, Which is important for a horse girl.
choice_data_list: I also have the desire to win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hah……

I can do my best because I want to win. And 
that hard work gives self — confidence.
Rice, let's do our best to aim for the derby!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …heh, yes. Rice, will try.
In this way, full-scale training for the Derby began.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Should I follow McQueen-san?
Yes, whatever happens, keep following her.
Yes, whatever happens, keep following her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Among the horse girls who is running in the Derby, 
the one who is regarded as the favorite is, the 
undefeated “Mihono Bourbon” so far.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She is an extraordinary horse girl who can run at an accurate 
machine-like pace, Her power is the real deal.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
In order to win over such a horse girl, Rice-san should be able 
to get away from me, as much as possible.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …I Got it. Rice will do her best and follow McQueen-san.

It takes a lot of stamina and concentration to get Mejiro McQueen 
level, who runs ahead.

Rice Shower was often pulled away at the beginning, but continued 
patiently, then a few days later.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hah… Hah….

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heh… Heh…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: You did it! you didn't let go of her once today!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, Rice's stamina will be her weapon.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: eh, Yes!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: All right, everyone, good night.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: See ya!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: See you tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Follow, Follow…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Will follow, Will Follow…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hah….

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Follow, Follow…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …that, Rice-san.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Are you going to sleep again with me today? I do not understand 
the meaning of coming into my private life.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But, Trainer-san told me ”no matter 
what happens” keep following her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: (It's definitely not like this.)

A few days later, we celebrated the day of the Twinkle Series 
festival “Japan Derby” . Now It is the day of the event.
